rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {2126%, 2136%, F3001%}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {IAR1602, OHS1000}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {IAR2202, IAR2204, IAR2303}

description: This unit will focus on the construction and design activities employed in the assembly and arrangement of materials for interior architecture projects.  The incorporation of services within inhabited environments will be introduced, and explored by students through focused observation and project work.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
